trans-unit.source: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 사용자에 전달 되는 "dummy" principal 개체의 읽기 전용 속성을 수정할 수 있도록 특정 특성에 대 한 쓰기 액세스를 제공는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> 사용 하는 경우 개체 [예제로 쿼리](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AdvancedFilters class is accessed from a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property, and is effectually treated like a property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object, and isn't intended to be used on its own.
trans-unit.target: AdvancedFilters 클래스에서 액세스는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>개체를 통해는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A>속성을 고의 속성은 처리 매핑하면는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>개체를 자체적으로 사용 하기 위한 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스화합니다 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 직접 호출할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Applications should access <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property of the user object.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에 액세스 해야 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters>통해는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A>사용자 개체의 속성입니다.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate*> attribute to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: 설정에 대 한 쿼리 필터는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate*>특성을 지정 된 시간 및 비교 형식.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 시간이 UTC 기본값으로 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> <xref:System.DateTime> <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> 개체</xref:System.DateTime> 의 속성</xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 지정

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>개체입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `expirationTime` should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> 지정 하는 방법을 `expirationTime` 비교에 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime*> query filter to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime*>쿼리 필터를 지정 된 시간 및 비교 형식.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime*>

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 시간이 UTC 기본값으로 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> <xref:System.DateTime> <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> 개체</xref:System.DateTime> 의 속성</xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 지정

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>개체입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `lockoutTime` should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> 지정 하는 방법을 `lockoutTime` 비교에 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a query filter for a property in an extended class.
trans-unit.target: 확장된 된 클래스에서 속성에 대 한 쿼리 필터를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute
trans-unit.target: 특성의 이름

trans-unit.source: An object.
trans-unit.target: 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 개체 유형을 `value`합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `value` should be compared to the attribute's value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> 지정 하는 방법을 `value` 특성의 값을 비교 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount*> attribute to the specified value and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: 설정에 대 한 쿼리 필터는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount*>특성을 지정 된 값과 비교 형식.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount*>

trans-unit.source: An integer.
trans-unit.target: 정수입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `badLogonCount` should be compared to the attribute's value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> 지정 하는 방법을 `badLogonCount` 특성의 값을 비교 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt*> attribute to the specified <xref:System.DateTime> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: 설정에 대 한 쿼리 필터는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt*>특성을 지정 된 <xref:System.DateTime>는 지정 된 값과 비교 합니다.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt*>

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 시간이 UTC 기본값으로 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> <xref:System.DateTime> <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> 개체</xref:System.DateTime> 의 속성</xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 지정

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>개체입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `lastAttempt` should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref> 지정 하는 방법을 `lastAttempt` 비교에 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.target: 설정에 대 한 쿼리 필터는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastLogon*>특성을 지정 된 <xref:System.DateTime>는 지정 된 값과 비교 합니다.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastLogon*>

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> <xref:System.DateTime> <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> 개체</xref:System.DateTime> 의 속성</xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 지정

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>개체입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> that specifies how `logonTime` should be used in the comparison.
